description:
On Sale Now! We can't sell it for less! If you like Halloween and you like word games, you're gonna love A Hangman Haunting. Get into the SCARY zone and have some FUN!

Enjoy a quick game when you've only got a minute, or play for hours and watch the time fly by. Check out the great graphics and cool animations while challenging your friends to see who knows more about Halloween. Expand your CREEPY vocabulary!

Need help solving the word? Not so fast Frankenstein - you've got to play the Cobwebs and Spiders mini-game INSIDE A Haunted Hangman to receive hints. What is Cobwebs and Spiders, you ask? Abracada-duh! It's an arachnophobe's tic-tac-toe nightmare!

If you've survived the haunting, and you're still in one piece, please rate this app and visit www.pjnation.com for more FUN GAMES!
